/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The sky overhead is filled with clouds, casting a soft light over the scene. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape.
